definition: to put down a revolt/to pacify a rebellion
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ping
to betray/to rebel/to revolt

sentences.english: Just now, Afghanistan needs foreign troops to undertake COIN.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，阿富汗依然需要外國軍隊進行平叛。

sentences.english: Anti-terrorism gave way to its much more potent cousin, anti-insurgency.
sentences.chinese: 反恐讓路給了其更有力的表親，平叛。

sentences.english: As for the counterinsurgency campaign—this summer is going to be a critical period.
sentences.chinese: 對於平叛行動來上，今年夏天會是一個關鍵時期。

sentences.english: Our counterinsurgency campaign in Afghanistan is really focused on winning the people.
sentences.chinese: 而我們在阿富汗的平叛運動的真正着眼點是贏得民心。

definition: armed rebellion
